# portkey_prompt_collections (Data Source)

Use this data source to list all Portkey prompt collections, optionally filtered by workspace.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all collections in a workspace
data "portkey_prompt_collections" "workspace_collections" {
  workspace_id = "ws-example-123456"
}

# List all collections across all workspaces
data "portkey_prompt_collections" "all" {}

# Use collection data
output "collection_count" {
  value = length(data.portkey_prompt_collections.workspace_collections.collections)
}

output "collection_names" {
  value = [for c in data.portkey_prompt_collections.workspace_collections.collections : c.name]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `workspace_id` (String) Filter collections by workspace ID. If not provided, returns all collections.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier for this data source.
- `collections` (List of Object) List of prompt collections. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--collections))

<a id="nestedatt--collections"></a>
### Nested Schema for `collections`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the collection was created.
- `id` (String) Collection identifier (UUID).
- `is_default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default collection for the workspace.
- `last_updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the collection was last updated.
- `name` (String) Name of the collection.
- `parent_collection_id` (String) Parent collection ID for nested collections.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier for the collection.
- `status` (String) Collection status (active, archived).
- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID where this collection belongs.
